title: Resident Evil 4 Remake Is 10x BETTER In VR!
description:
The Resident Evil 4 Remake VR mode is releasing as a free update to the base Resident Evil 4 game exclusively on PSVR 2 today! I jump in to check out and bring you these first impressions. 

Check out the Resident Evil 4 remake and the free Resident Evil 4 VR demo here (50% off until 11/12/23);
https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP0102-PPSA07412_00-RE4RMAINGAME0000

Here's the link to the free Resident Evil 4 Remake VR mode if you're struggling to find it;
https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP0102-PPSA07412_00-RE4RDLC000000028

Let me know what you all think of the Resident Evil 4 remake PSVR 2 VR mode in the comments below...

Thanks for watching []-)
